data.name: ROUGH KUTS: The Brain That Wouldn't Die
data.detailed_description:
THE BRAIN THAT WOULDN'T DIE (1962)

PLOT: A doctor experimenting with transplant techniques keeps his girlfriend's head alive when she is decapitated in a car crash, then goes hunting for a new body.

This is an interactive version of a classic B&W film with multiple story paths or choices to be made throughout the viewing.
Your choices & actions help create your own version of the film. You're the director now!

ROUGH KUTS are all about bringing fun classic public domain films to a new audience and in a new format (INTERACTIVE GAMES!)

Look for more ROUGH KUTS titles on Steam
